Title: Ensure slab follows outline of ground floor.
Batten line is not shown on slab.
All load bearing walls are indicated.
All internal and external walls dimensioned and dimensions are accurate.
Point load symbols shown and dimensioned. Point loads are split for joinery
All point loads end up on a sufficient beam or a load bearing wall.
Portal panel shoes shown and dimensioned. Note added to ensure coursing blocks are left out where the shoe is positioned.
Slab edge distance and spacing between bolts connecting portal frames/steel posts are correct.
If step in slab level appears, it is clearly indicated and detail is added.
